key.name: remove-separator-1
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove the separator-1.

key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Suspend Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-restart-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Restart Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-power-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Power Off Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-separator-2
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove the separator-2.

key.name: remove-logout-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove the logout Item from system's menu.
